sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Open Access to Research Articles Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Open Access to Research Articles Act.

sections.heading: Purpose.  The General Assembly finds and declares the

Definitions. In this Act, "public university" means the University of Illinois, Southern Illinois University, Chicago State University, Eastern Illinois University, Governors State University, Illinois State University, Northeastern Illinois University, Northern Illinois University, Western Illinois
sections.text: Definitions. In this Act, "public university" means the University of Illinois, Southern Illinois University, Chicago State University, Eastern Illinois University, Governors State University, Illinois State University, Northeastern Illinois University, Northern Illinois University, Western Illinois University, or any other public university or college now or hereafter established or authorized by the General Assembly.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
